modName: Beast Race Normal Maps for CBBE Slim
summary: Modified vanilla normal maps to fit the CBBE Slim body
descriptionHtml:
Description: 

contained are simply two textures to make Khajiit and Argonian females look correct when used with CBBE Slim.  I have not tested with other CBBE versions.

Installation:

unzip and drop the \"Textures\" folder into your Skyrim \"Data\" folder, confirm dialogues, remove shirt.

Requirements:

CBBE Slim Body installed ( http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666 )

Details:

I am not a texture artist and these are rough, but quite functional.  Nothing sticks out to my eye in game.  They were made for personal use but all are welcome to re-use and modify as they see fit without credit.
author: sfyak

files.name: Beast Race Normal Maps for CBBE Slim
